name: Co-Op Coop
description:
Co-Op Coop is a Puzzle Platformer Party Game where you and 3 other people can team up to tackle escaping a castle! This uniquely styled multiplayer game takes place in medieval times, where a band of mages are wrongly convicted on a crime and imprisoned in the dungeons of the castle's king. They cannot escape alone; can they cooperate enough to get away?

This game uses a full sized keyboard with a number pad (make sure to toggle number lock!). Patches may come in the future containing more control options.

=- CONTROLS -=

WASD - Player 1 (Red)

IJKL - Player 2 (Blue)

Arrow Keys - Player 3 (Green)

8456 (Number Pad) - Player 4 (Purple)

For each player, their respective up direction is their jump action, and their left and right directional keys move them in that direction.
